title: Too Many Husbands
description: Naughty and Nice...All Casey Croyden wanted for Christmas was a husband. Not a permanent one - just a man to play the part and help her impress the traditional Japanese businessman she was entertaining over the holidays. Sounded simple enough. Hire one from Actor's Equity.When John Gallagher arrived on her doorstep, the attraction between them was no act. And the debonair Mr Gallagher was no actor! Casey didn't have the faintest idea who he was, but she had no time to trifle over details. Especially over the other minor glitch in her plan...what to do with him when the lights went out!
author: Elise Title
